Articles.Content:
Details: 1430 (with welding!)

 Crew: 4 (default)

 Weight: 167

Used mods: Infernal robotics, Ubiozur welding, TweekScale.

 The ship turned out quite similar to the original, but badly heavy. It can fly, let out swarm, which kills everything in its path, catch and eat asteroids.

**There are subtitles.**

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iEZKBjtCJZM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

That's a very... interesting shape 0\_0

[http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/634/133/be3.gif](http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/634/133/be3.gif)

But I do like the SWAAAAARM OF DOOOOM!

THAT's a big vessel , sure you have spend good among of time on it ! Visual is very beautiful .

I got one question : Where have you find a Workable Welding mod ? The last 5 version i found just don't work at all !

I use it on KSP 0.23 with minor bug or crash but begin to be unplayable still KSP 0.24 with less perf compared to a non-welded craft !!!
Nicely made but it does bring back some bad memories. Lexx must be the worst Sci-Fi series EVER made. I know some people love it but it fails on absolutely all fronts

Awesome creation! But i can only second, that Lexx was one of the most awful sci fi serie ever created... ok, we count Eva Habermann and the Lexx launch scene out of the awful equation ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
[**@Rainbow-Dashie**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/78172-Rainbow-Dashie) HaHa. I think that's what most of us were thinking.

For those unfamiliar with the Lexx:

![the_lexx_ortho_by_unusualsuspex-d715jxy.jpg](http://th03.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/f/2014/007/3/c/the_lexx_ortho_by_unusualsuspex-d715jxy.jpg)

> 
> Nicely made but it does bring back some bad memories. Lexx must be the worst Sci-Fi series EVER made.

I suspect that was the point, it's so bad it almost comes full circle. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Where have you find a Workable Welding mod

[https://github.com/UbioWeldingLtd/UbioWeldContinued](https://github.com/UbioWeldingLtd/UbioWeldContinued)

> 
> Nicely made but it does bring back some bad memories. Lexx must be the worst Sci-Fi series EVER made. I know some people love it but it fails on absolutely all fronts

It's one of my guilty pleasures, falls very squarely into the "so bad it's good" category for me.

> 
> That shape...

Stop that! It's a dragonfly.![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

More like a dragondi.. ehm fly, yes, fly ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Bad jokes apart, awesome work man

> 
> [https://github.com/UbioWeldingLtd/UbioWeldContinued](https://github.com/UbioWeldingLtd/UbioWeldContinued)

Thx man , I think this mod was dead ! great news !

> 
> Thx man , I think this mod was dead ! great news !

If there is demand, there will be supply. So this mod just can't die.
